Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: trixx K
Reviews.Content: The motel is beautifull, really clean and its employees are nice and polite. Nice bedrooms, with tv and fridge. There´s a great center patio where coffee is always hot so you can just chill there for a while, and have a nice time!!! We really enjoy this motel, breakfast was good too!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good cheap place for just having a bed to sleep.”
Reviews.Author: paulauster999
Reviews.Content: You'll see many mix reviews of this motel. This is a good place if you having reasonable expectations in relation to what you are paying for. The motel have three main areas: ground floor rooms, first floor rooms and outside rooms. Consider the latter if you want privacy as they can be access by the parking lot without been seen (but less safer). The motel is located in a so so area, but it is not a problem if you are with you own or rented car. It is not the place to go if you plan to go for a walk at night, but Miami is like that: without a car you are not going anywhere. With a car, the location is quite convenient. You're like in the middle of everything: Miami Beach, Sawgrass, Downtown, Airport are all withing reasonable driving times. The place has a nice modern design, despite being far from cool and frankly speaking done with standard to cheap materials. The room was reasonable clean and personally I have not experience the rude attitude by the staff. As a matter of fact they have been rather helpful and also one of the girls at the front desk is very pretty also. The motel also have a nice common area where you can meet other people or even have meals so no need to pay for a restaurants. Good for young people but not for those looking for a quite place. The staff is very fluent both in English and Spanish. Probably, the main two significant cons of the motel is the wi-fi coverage, good in the common areas but bad in the rooms, and low ventilation of the rooms. All the windows have fixed panels so can't be open, and this generate some humidity problems (not very serious but important for some). Regarding the wi-fi, it is not something of this motel: for some reason wi-fi coverage in many hotels (even high scale) is very bad when now this service is essential and very cheap to provide. A third contrary could be a below average breakfast. Self service coffee, yoghurt and juices, which are nice, but only donuts for eating. Adding some bread slices and biscuits could be great for a better experience. The issue with the deposit for the remote is usual in places like this in Latin America, so it is not such an issue. Don't expect a Hilton's room or a great breakfast in a $80/day motel. Overall, it is a good place for male solo or group travellers for a couple of nights, or for young women or couples in a budget provided are not looking for any luxury. Definetly, it is a below 35 years place, pointed towards youngers. Not a "all party time" place like a hostel, but it is not quite.

Reviews.Title: “would not recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Coco B
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for one night. Room looked very different from the one in the internet. Very , very noisy. You can hear your neighbours snooring, ring of every phone, etc. Very unfriendly lady at the reception. Had to pay $ 5,-- for remote of TV and $ 5,-- for key.(?) If you want to turn the water to hot, there's only a few drops coming out of the shower. Over all, not a nice experience. Gabi

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs & very bad service”
Reviews.Author: Bill M
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my partner in December and it was one of the worst experiences that we have had. We have traveled to third world countries and had better service then this place. We booked a room for one week because we were there for a conference. They gave us a room with no closet to start with and we were there for one week. We asked the front desk person to move us and she would not. So I asked her to call the owner of the motel, he finally moved us to an outside room in front of the parking lot that is right on the main street. It was noisy and the car lights shined right inside the room. We asked many times for them to move us and they refused, we had red blotches all over our body from the bed bites that I showed the owner and pleaded with him to move us. They refused again. The rooms were dirty and their maids do not clean well. hair on the floor and in the shower. We had to move out after staying there 3 nights. The manager was very rude and the front desk person was very rude. I would not recommend this to anyone. The pictures that they show are nothing like what the place looks like. The worst part is the unprofessional behavior of the owner and his staff that is something that no one should have to go through. The bed mites were really bad.

Reviews.Title: “Cutest little motel”
Reviews.Author: traveling_tegan
Reviews.Content: Trying to find a reasonably priced hotel in miami was getting stressful. Cheap ones were ghetto. And didnt want to over pay for just a one night stay. I found thus hotel and we couldn't have had a better expirence. There isnt any thing fancy, just very simple. Room was clean, bathroom was clean. I could even smell the bleach in the sheets. The breakfast was better than i expected had dunkin doughnuts, yogurt, bagels with cream cheese. It was nice to sit in the little courtyard and just enjoy the morning. It was also nice to hear all the other languages of the other guests. If you go venturing out for dinner, be warned the neighborhood seems a bit run down, but we didnt have any problems. This area was probably ince the place to be. It costs about 25$to to get here by taxi from the airport. Will definitely stay here again if we leave for another cruise out of miami.

Reviews.Title: “Fine”
Reviews.Author: Angie1981_10
Reviews.Content: My stay here was fine , Check in was fast, just my confirmation number and keys, our room, bed was oke and very comfortable. but the shower floors was slippery when you taking a bath. Closed to every where in just 10 or 20 minuut.

Reviews.Title: “A nice choice if on a budget or just needing a room for a night or two...”
Reviews.Author: misslucyKW
Reviews.Content: This hotel is average. It's not somewhere you'd want to stay for more than 2 nights. The beds are nice and comfortable though which is a plus. Our room was upstairs and overlooked the common area, it was fine, nothing special, clean but old, needs some painting and upgrades. It was close to where I needed to be, they have free parking to. The staff were not very professional, the standards aren't high but they do have a sense of humor. I'd recommend this place. No bed bugs.

Reviews.Title: “What you would expect at 2/3 market price”
Reviews.Author: Tillersweep
Reviews.Content: They did a lot of updating, so it looks pretty good. The location is on the border of a bad area. It was clean but we did not get the queen size bed we booked. There were too many three-way plugs and extension cords for my taste.

Reviews.Title: “Three days in great relaxing atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: Al_Delta
Reviews.Content: We really like our stay at Bianco, ithe room - 10b - was great (for the money) and we loved our breakfast in a cosy club stile yard under the open sky, will come again.

Reviews.Title: “This is a budget motel popular with young, international travelers”
Reviews.Author: pau_hana_66
Reviews.Content: You stay at a place like this to save money. And you get what you pay for. It is a very basic, very laid-back place that is popular with young European and Latin American travelers. The room is clean. Good hot water. Furniture looks like it was bought at garage sales but was functional. The neighborhood appears to be pretty safe, especially in the daytime. Not sure if I'd want my wife/girlfriend walking around by herself at night, however. I recommend that you have the AC running on low to cut down on background noise (the humming of the unit puts me to sleep). Overall, I wouldn't object to staying here again but I would be willing to pay a little more money to stay at a different hotel/motel in the area. PS. I've noticed many budget hotel options in the Miami area that get numerous bad reviews while Motel Bianco generally gets decent reviews. After staying here, those other places must really be [--].

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: StockholmSweden83
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap hotel to sleep at, after a 18 hour journey from Europe to Miami and found Motel Bianco. Booked the one night via Hotels.com, for aprox 50 USD and I guess I got what I should have expected: a room and a bed. As a plus, you also get free parking and a nice looking patio. Problem is, that I expected more. Yes, there was a TV but I had to a pay a deposit for the remote (which hotel does that?!), there was WiFi but only if I had my phone in a certain (uncomfortable) angle, furniture in room looked like it had been there since the 70's and the room could have used some fresh paint. I felt a little bit cheated on by the pictures on the website: I assumed it would be a funky, IKEA style (cheap but modern) motel but only the patio and the lobby had gotten a facelift. Conclusion: When arriving there with the right expectations: Good motel. If you want something more than just the basics, find another place!

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location”
Reviews.Author: Derek R
Reviews.Content: PMLJohn's review was right on...the only thing different that I experienced was that the internet connection worked very well for the the 90 minutes or so that I used it. This was my second time staying at this motel (first time was in July of 2011 and both times my expectations were met. The one thing I would highly recommend is that the motel make the small investment in electrical outlets for the bathrooms. Many guests rely on electric shavers and hair dryers and need electricity in the bathrooms. But overall, a great value for anyone looking for a safe, clean, place to lay your head for a night or two with easy access to downtown Miami, Brickell, South Beach, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Motel at a Decent Price”
Reviews.Author: PMLJohn
Reviews.Content: I have to question some of the negative reviews of this motel, especially after staying here for 3 days. What do people expect for such a low price? The Hyatt this is not. But for the money and the location, you will not, you should not, be disappointed. If you are, then you really should book something that does not have "motel" in the name. The motel is a smart, tidy little art deco style place, right on Biscayne Blvd. There are two parts to the motel, one being an old school, drive up to your door motel, and the other, a traditional 2 story, wrapped around a courtyard. The place has a look of a recent remodel. Clean and bright, with tile floors, orange deco walls and unique wall hangings and furniture in the lobby. The desk clerk was polite and efficient. The check in process hassle free. I was given a corner unit, in the front, facing Biscayne. If you are sensitive to traffic noise, this is not the room for you. If you are a city dweller already, this is a great room. Nice windows looking onto Biscayne. A wrap around terrace, private to the room. The floors are tile. The furnishings older in appearance. The TV, small and old school. The bathroom was clean and tidy. The bed was firm and the pillows sufficient. The courtyard is beautiful. There are nice patio furnishings to lounge about on. There is a coffee counter and daily breakfast is served, utilizing this courtyard space. It is intimate and a great spot to gather and chill, or meet fellow travelers, if that is your thing. The breakfast was OK, typical offerings from pretty much any motel/hotel. Dunkin' Donuts, cereal, bagels, yogurt, juice, coffee. I did appreciate that the hours for breakfast were more in line with a vacationing schedule, from 8-11am, vs 6-9 at most other locations. This allowed for a decent selection, even if you came downstairs at 9am. My issues with the place were few. The lighting in the rooms is in need of upgrade. There are two table lamps, and that is it. So nighttime is dim and early mornings as well. There are no plugs in the bathroom. There is no shampoo or other "normal" amenities in the room, like a clock. I also found it odd that there is a deposit required for the room key and TV remote. I could understand if this was an "hourly" motel, or I was somehow, sketchy looking. I did not have the $10 cash required, and was given a pass at registration. However, at 10:15pm, there was a knock on my door, with the desk clerk looking to see if I got cash. I did not, and never paid the deposit. Not sure why this is required, and how $10 could replace either product if it went missing. Just a weird policy and a bit off. The Internet connectivity was spotty, at best. I went hours without getting solid connectivity. I saw repeaters placed in the courtyard, but perhaps a couple more are needed. All in all, this is a great value for the money. It is clean, safe feeling and the whole staff seemed nice. The location is perfect for anyone wanting to get into Miami Downtown, South Beach or Aventura. I went to all of these locations and they are all convenient and close. Again, I wonder what some expect, but this met my expectations and exceeded in some respects. I will stay here again, and I will have my employees stay here when on business.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and Clean”
Reviews.Author: Tamika C
Reviews.Content: All I needed was cheap and clean. A place to feel comfortable. And I got all I needed. The room was a little bright at night but I fell asleep and did not notice lol. It's fine trust me...nothing bad to report.

Reviews.Title: “Where We Stay When in Town”
Reviews.Author: bunny_foofoo9
Reviews.Content: Motel Bianco is not in a great part of town. But if you like experimental music and modern art, this area really is a hot spot if you know where to look (such as Churchill's Pub and Sweat Records). We come to stay here every year for INC (the International Noise Conference) and Summer of Weird. Its in walking distance from the venues the shows take place in. The front desk really is on top of keeping the crack dealers and prostitutes out (unlike other places like Seven Seas Motel...AHHHH). They will also help you get parking if they see the spaces are limited. There is a nice internal courtyard. The place has a deco feel. The rooms are clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Second time around was horrible!”
Reviews.Author: Ikuto90
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I've stayed here in motel bianco and i would have to say the first time was a lot better than this time around. I booked the Courtyard King on there main website for Aug 18-22, when we arrived at the hotel and got into our room it was a small full size bed!, it was already 8pm we tired from driving and just wanted to go to bed so we went to the front and told the young lady that we asked for a king not full not even queen. she moved us to a "suppose" two kind size bed room, when we got there it was a two size full beds but we were way to freaking tired to go back, i can't even begin to explain how uncomfortable we slept that night, it was just horrible. I was so pissed off i kept waking up in the middle of the night almost falling off the bed and the next day after we came back from the event we attended i spoke to the late night person there a man and he apologized for everything and promised us a king size the next morning. We slept in different beds that night because they were so small. Sure enough the guy kept his promise, the rest of the trip was fine but the whole changing rooms twice even when i reserved a the king size room is ridiculous, i will only return to this place if last min plan. Next time we will stay at the Hyatt and pay extra for everything if it mean we'll get what we paid for. The rest of the room was "ok".

Reviews.Title: “Loved it definitely coming back !”
Reviews.Author: fabie123
Reviews.Content: Went to Miami with my family and the first night we went to seven seas we didn't like so we went to Bianco even though it was more money . We stayed for the next two nights , the room was clean nice and comfortable. Only thing i wish was they should have a pool. They have a security guard at night. They change your sheet every day even when your in the room. For example we had put a stain on the sheet by mistake. And we came back they had change it. We had two closet , a desk area , and a fridge. I thing to recommended ask for the rooms by the courtyard because those are way bigger. They give free breakfast every-morning. You suppose to leave the hotel at 11am but if you let them know in advance they'll give you TWO EXTRA HOURS with NO CHARGE. I will be definitely be staying here again it worth the price !

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly nice little motel”
Reviews.Author: mrsdeb
Reviews.Content: I found the staff to be friendly and helpful, even with my barely passable Spanish. The room was clean, with a desk, fridge, and microwave; it had free internet; there were stores and restaurants very close by; the parking lot was small, but when we arrived late one night and it was full, the staff directed us to a spot around the corner. There's a bus stop right over the road that goes downtown. My only complaint was that we were facing the courtyard, and it is unbelievably brightly lit at night - you have to be very careful to get your blinds completely closed or you'll have a hard time sleeping! There's a $10 cash deposit for the key and remote, which they give back to you when you leave. No, it's not luxurious. But for the price, it can't be beat. I'm going back this winter.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: visitor321
Reviews.Content: We were there for one night, only to find the service was poor and all the staff there were trying to take money out of your pocket. The room is very small, and you need to pay $10 deposit even for the TV remoter. For the free breakfast, they even don't have hot water for tea (you need to heat water via microwave in public area). The internet doesn't work well. Tips: nvr checking out late, even within one hour. They would take away your deposit and respond you terribly. With the money, you can totally find a good one in other place.

Reviews.Title: “Average place if on a Miami budget”
Reviews.Author: roman158
Reviews.Content: We don't care about the beach and the people over there we rather explore the whole Florida state than only South Beach so this motel served that purpose. For people wanting to go to the beach every day this place feels a little remote as it is a 10 minute drive to the Beach. Rooms are basic motel style so don't expect glitter and glamour in there. But for the price we paid for one night we couldn't ask for much more The lady at the front desk (smiling and friendly) told us that this place had a makeover 6 months ago. The reception area looks modern and fresh but the rooms could use some upgrades. No breakfast provided but there are plenty of restaurants in the area. You have to pay 10 dollar deposit for the remote and the key. The parking is free but I think to small if it gets crowded. I would recommend Motel Bianco if on a budget or if you don't want to spend your entire vacation on South Beach :)

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, but a little too far away from Miami Beach”
Reviews.Author: oOAnniOo
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Motel Bianco for 5 nights in the beginning of May and I was really satisfied. The Motel was very clean, our room was big and we also had a fridge. I am a student and normally I sleep in shabby hostels, so that was almost luxury for me. The emploeey were all very friendly and helpful, and always answerd all of my daily questions. There is a Burger King right across the street and a Super Market and a CVS a few blocks away. The bus stop is also right in front of the Motel. The only dislike was the location, because we were pretty much in the middle of nowhere. To get to Miami Beach you need to chance buses, and for every bus you need to pay 2$ so in the end you spent 8$ for riding the Bus every day. But considering the price of the Motel, it's probably still cheaper than a stay in Miami Beach. I also have to say that this Motel is no place to hang around the whole day. We pretty much just stayed there for sleeping, and that was good.

Reviews.Title: “Never again!”
Reviews.Author: Crysty23
Reviews.Content: Well i stayed here thinking it was going to be a nice cheap place, well there was only one good thing about this place and it was the guy they have working as a bell boy he helps you with your luggage and he walks you to your car at night, besides that everything is bad. the rooms are really small with nothing but a t.v and bed/bath. NO pool and parking was bad too, internet connection was also really bad.The guy in the front desk was also very rude to me and my friends. Service was bad, and rooms dont get cleaned daily! NEVER AGAIN WILL I STAY AT THAT HOTEL< and i dont recomend no one does either !

Reviews.Title: “DAMN THE PARKING!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: 1FemaleTraveler
Reviews.Content: KING SIZE BED, just right for making love encased Television; nice doubled size shower; nice patrolman with a stick; eh' PRICE; no friggin' way! TooExpensive freezer/fridge; nice

Reviews.Title: “I need comfort and security more than I need value.”
Reviews.Author: travelnpaants
Reviews.Content: I needed a room last minute in Miami and I was on a budget. When I walked in the lobby smelled like an old homeless wino and my room smelled alittle musky but it faded away after i lit a candle. Newly painted white walls, nice down comforters, very old funishing, but decent enough.. I stayed on the upper level. I did not see any bugs, the ac was cold . White towels, no tolietries, very basic. The hotel was fairly clean visually, but I never felt exactly like I was in a clean room......hard to explain. Mostly Spanish tv channels, but who is really watching tv? The area is very scary at night, Im taliking pimps, huslters, and prostitutes hanging out sometimes midday at the starbucks. It is kinda downtown and under some kind of revitalization process so be forewarned. I would not recommend this motel to anyone faint of heart or a single female traveller because it kinda rough. Traffic is a mess, the streets are all torn apart because of construction. The refridgerator kept me awake at night, its very loud. And, some guest were alittle nosy the first night. Parking is limited, so dont get in too late. No heat.......I was cold at night. Many restuarants, coffee shops, i saw a Marshalls,Walgreens, Publix, Target, and Ross. And, I was a stone throw from the beach all for about 85 bucks a night (with tax).. The fronk desk lady (older) is very nice. The late shift guys are alittle weird they watch you like hawks. I would say Motel Bianco is practical, economical option if you are not easily bothered by things and you are ok with being in a seedy area. I love the idea, art deco.....modern...artsy on the "cheap", but I probably wont be back because its alittle too much "action" for me, it was hard for me to relax.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and comfortable hotel...i would recommend it”
Reviews.Author: LovelyBrown30
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly. Yes there is a $10 refundable charge for the remote. At first the room within the courtyard was too small so we requested a king size bed and was relocated to the rooms by the parking. The staff was very accomodating of this change. The courtyard is a nice addition for relaxing though this is where the microwave is located but it provides an opportunity to meet the other guests. While the motel is close to eateries being located on biscayne blvd it was not so close to the popular malls. Overall the motel is value for money, a nice comfortable stay for less than a week or so.

Reviews.Title: “Reservation Mistakes, Lies and No Apologies”
Reviews.Author: chri5tina
Reviews.Content: I made the reservation online and requested a non-smoking room. When I arrived I was given a smoking room (complete with awful stench and ash trays). When I asked at the front desk to have my room switched, I was told that the rooms were all full, so I would have to talk to the administration in the morning. To be fair the rooms were clean and it is a pretty courtyard. Water flow in the show was low but there was enough hot water. However, you have to put a $10 cash deposit to get the TV remote and there are no phones in the rooms (I had to use my cell to call the front desk). The thing that absolutely ruined my stay was when we checked out. Since I'm allergic to smoke I felt terrible in the morning, and I went to the front desk to ask for a discount on my stay. The girl at the front desk went to ask, and came back to tell me no, the room I stayed in IS non-smoking. I asked about the smell and the ash tray, and how could she pretend it was a non-smoking room, and she said the ash tray was to take out to the patio to smoke. I felt to awful to argue, but I probably would've have gotten into "Do you think I'm stupid?" pretty fast. It's been remodeled to look pretty, but the rooms are pretty ghetto, no frills is just a nice way to say it, but it is clean. I probably would have given it a tolerable rating if it weren't for the way I was treated, which was absolutely appalling.

Reviews.Title: “roach problem”
Reviews.Author: nina_hermosa
Reviews.Content: The staff was super nice and friendly, so I was hesitant to leave a bad review, but I think it's fair to warn other travelers. The room I stayed in had roaches in it- baby roaches, adult ones. I also noticed suspicious bites all over my body too, which could be from bedbugs. They don't look like mosquito bites, and I wasn't in the areas where I could be exposed to other insects. I will have to go through major inconvenience now of laundering all my luggage. Not recommended, sorry :(

Reviews.Title: “AC saved our life lol!, great place for the price and location”
Reviews.Author: Ikuto90
Reviews.Content: This place was great! it was clean, comfortable, affordable, and near soooo much. We went for August 20-22 for the anime convention in the hyatt 5 min near this place, i went with a friend and it was great everything was pretty much good except the net which had to be outside to work and for some reason we still weren't getting any so that was for me a pretty bad fall since everyone today lives off the internet and computers but it wasn't as bad. Near a lot of fast food places and our event was only 5 min away which was great. Also the renovation was just like in the pics no false hopes we got just what we saw in the photos which is a plus and trustful, staff were friendly always opening the door for us it was a perfect experience, and as i said in the title it was killing hot outside so the ac worked MARVELOUS it really saved us. I recommend everyone stay here it was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Cant complain to much price was good”
Reviews.Author: CER123
Reviews.Content: So this was our first trip to Miami so not wanting to spend a bunch on our hotel we did get what we paid for. We pull up and the location wasnt at all what we expected. I think some of the pics were misleading and they only highlight the best parts of the motel. We go to check in and the girl at the front had a very nasty little tude. We were then informed that we had to pay a 5.00 deposit for the remote to the tv... a little silly but we did anyways. We go to the room and the door wouldnt open we were informed to jiggle it around and it would open. Well it did and believe it or not the room was very well kept. Considering we didnt spend a whole bunch of time in our room it made for a great vacation. I know what I mentioned above does sound harsh but I wanted to just give you guys a heads up on this place. Want a clean and affordable place to stay then this is the place. Want a safe feeling enviroment where people dont have a tude and you dont have to put a deposit down for your remote then this is not the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great motel for price.”
Reviews.Author: Daymarpr
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed there 4 nights in June. Ve clean and very helpful staff. Wolud surely stay there again. maybe in fall. Reccomend it for family, solo travels .

Reviews.Title: “Great and Affordable”
Reviews.Author: SweetLadee
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice and clean little motel. It is quiet and well kept. the lobby and the courtyard are nicley decorated. The rooms are clean and comfortable with working AC. There is a TV and refrigerator in each room. There aren't any phones, microwaves or irons in the rooms but there is a microwave in the courtyard and you can get an iron at the front desk. The staff is delightful, especially the night staff. This is a great motel and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and pleasant place to stay”
Reviews.Author: bentlicito
Reviews.Content: My Stay at Bianco Motel was very pleasant. The staff was very helpful and friendly as well. The Motel is relatively close to downtown and most importantly has easy access to main roads.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
Reviews.Title: “A Diamond in The Rough!”
Reviews.Author: leype
Reviews.Content: We found this little motel online and booked a courtyard room through their website and we were so glad we did! We saved a lot of money and the place was really cool. It looks like a trendy little boutique hotelâ€¦ and everything we needed was within walking distance. Highly Recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Cute, but unclean and poorly lit”
Reviews.Author: WhiteGreyBlack
Reviews.Content: My co-worker and I (both from the West Coast) stayed here for one night. For $50, the location, safety, air conditioning, and common areas of the motel aren't bad. However, what you can't tell from the pictures is that the rooms are pretty cramped (the bed takes up most of the space), and poorly lit. Our room had two bedside lamps (with dark lamp shades) to light the whole room, and the bathroom had one bulb in a wall sconce. The TV was plugged into an extension cord which was dangerously stretched to reach the wall outlet. Our water pitcher was dirty. There were small hairs (perhaps from a beard trimming) on the bathroom faucet and between the faucet and backsplash. Our bed sheets were clean, but when I lay down I could smell urine emanating from the mattress or bed pad. There were old cigarette butts all over the balcony. If you pick up one of the hotel/travel guides at any FL rest stop, or even search online, you can find coupons that bring a stay at a dependably bright, clean, safe chain hotel down to $50-60/night.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant and affordable suprise!”
Reviews.Author: iagad
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been recently renovated and the rooms are spotless. The center courtyard is well lit and inviting as a "hang out" area. Prices are beyond reasonable, and the staff greeted my by name when I walked past the front desk. It is close to many things, and charmingly bright in its themes of white and orange. I cannot recommend this Perfectly priced hotel enough.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended!”
Reviews.Author: JonyR
Reviews.Content: We heard about this new little motel in the design district and so we decided to try it out. It doesnâ€™t look like much from the outside but when you go in itâ€™s a huge surprise! Itâ€™s all white with bright orange doors. Try to get one of the courtyard rooms because thatâ€™s where everyone hangs out in the eveningâ€¦ Definitely check out the Bianco!

Reviews.Title: “Great motel and great service”
Reviews.Author: Sebacho9
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel for 3 nights and were pleasently surprised to see that the entire motel has been recently renovated. The lobby has a huge seating area and chairs if you wish to relax. Very clean, great staff and most of all great location

Reviews.Title: “A great experience from start to finish!”
Reviews.Author: cinthiamr
Reviews.Content: I had to fly to down to FL for a few business meetings and a friend recommended me this motel it was very lovely it met all of my expectations. The staff was warm and welcoming from the front desk clark to the people i'd pass by in the hall! as for the room it was very clean and comfortable plus i had a great view. Im very pleased with Motel Bianco i would stay there again and again with no problems or complains keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: soniamel
Reviews.Content: Perfect location, excellent staff, i want to come back just to have fun and relax

Reviews.Title: “Great location and excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: Eutravler
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel that has been recently renovated. Great location close to all areas in Miami. Nice and very helpful staff will make your stay pleasant!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Price Great Rooms”
Reviews.Author: rocioHallandale
Reviews.Content: The most clean Rooms for relax after a hard business day.Close to Convetion Centers in Miami Beach y Downtown. My recommendation for Business and Vacation.Excellent place to go.

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel, friendly staff and decent location.”
Reviews.Author: Skephon
Reviews.Content: This motel is about ten minutes from downtown Miami, and ten minutes driving from south beach. The staff was very friendly, and the hall was very nicely decorated, with cute white/orange chairs, there was a nice lounging area outside with a microwave. There are plenty of free parking spaces. Free internet is accesible in some rooms. The room was nice, I loved the little details like the toiletpaper that had the end folded in a triangle, (sounds strange, but it just looks nicer). The bed was okay, looked nice and the sheets were very clean. Room had a nice atmosphere to it, but rooms can be quite noisy since the walls are very thin. The things I would advise Motel Bianco are: *fix the things that need fixing (door, window, lamps). *clean the bathroom more accurate; although in general pretty clean, there were still some hairs in the showering area. *and very important; when you use a bleach to get those sheets as sparkling white as they are, please be sure to wash them again with a nice-smelling detergent, because the bleach smell kept me from sleeping and irritated my throat a lot. During high season, this motel offers very good prices; so if Ã½ou're on a budget and have a car, I would recommend for a few nights. If you have more to spend, it might be more fun to be located more closely on south beach.

HotelInfo.Name: Motel Bianco
HotelInfo.Address: 5255 Biscayne Blvd., Miami, FL 33137
